content: each of first 4 sts inserting hk from front of work work 1 lsc into each of the 2 free single_crochet in a 3 row below *1 single_crochet into each of the next 10 sts on prev row work 2 lsc 3 row below as before repeat from * to last 4 sts 1 single_crochet into each of next 3 pattern note sts 1 single_crochet into 3rd of chain 3 at beg of prev row turn 34 single_crochet square measures 10 x 10 at this point row 6 using color a chain 1 work 1 single_crochet into each although st count isn t paramount during of single_crochet to end turn do not finish off color a round 2 you may increase or decrease the double_crochet carry up side of square attach color b in last st sts in order to achieve the same number of sts 34 single_crochet on each side of the square if desired see special instructions on double_crochet increase and double_crochet decrease row 7 using color b chain 1 * work 1 single_crochet into first single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into next single_crochet 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 special instructions single_crochet 1 e into each of next 2 single_crochet 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into next single_crochet 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet double_crochet increase double_crochet increase work two chain 2 skip 2 single_crochet repeat from * to end omitting chain 2 at end of last repeat turn double_crochet stitches in the same stitch row 8 chain 1 * work 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into double_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease work a next half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 double_crochet 1 e into double_crochet in the specified stitch until two each of next 2 e 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 double_crochet 1 loops remain on the hook keeping these two half_double_crochet into next half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet chain 2 repeat loops on hook work another double_crochet in from * to end omitting chain 2 at end of last repeat the next stitch until three loops remain on hook turn finish off color b attach color a to last st hook yarn and draw through all three loops on row 9 using color a chain 1 * 1 single_crochet into each of the hook next 10 sts inserting hk from front of work work 1 lsc into each of 2 free single_crochet in a 3 row below round 2 chain 3 count as double_crochet in next st work 2 double_crochet repeat from * omitting 2 lsc at end of last repeat turn chain 2 2 double_crochet corner made work 1 double_crochet in each st to next middle corner st work corner repeat pat around square join with slip_stitch to beg chain-3 repeat row 2 9 twice more round 3 chain 2 *half_double_crochet in each st to corner in corner repeat row 2 6 once more do not attach work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet repeat
